item.title: Celine Dion & Peabo Bryson - Beauty And The Beast
item.description:
tale as old as time
turn as it can be
barely even friends
then somebody bends
unexpectedly
just a little change
small to say
the least both
a little scared
neither one prepared
beauty and the beast
ever just the same
ever a surprise
ever as before
ever just as sure
as the sun will rise-

ever just the same
ever a surprise
ever as before
ever just as sure
as the sun will rise
oh oh oh
tale as old as time
time as old as song
bitter sweet
and strange finding
you can change leaming
you were wrong
certain as
the sun rising
in the east tale
as old as time song
as old as rhyme
beauty and the beast
tale as old as time
song as old as rhyme
beauty and
the beast-

beauty and
the beast-
